document.title: Hot Topic: Social Security Changes Cost-of-Living Adjustments (COLA) (2008)
document.abstract: Social Security Income (SSI) beneficiaries will receive a 2.3 percent cost-of-living adjustment for 2008.

field.name: comments
field.value:
